Please ignore the first attachment.  Bugzilla does not seem to handle bitmaps 
very well.

I can make this happen by setting the "Maximum number of compilation errors" to 
10.  When I set the value back to 100, the error goes away.

I saw the problem as well. I had changed all "Ignore" settings to 
"Warning".  I could rebuild without problem after doing a "Restore 
Defaults".
